div.h1: Welcome to City Day Community School
div.p: Having been founded in 1999, City Day Community School is one of Dayton's oldest community schools. Over the years, City Day's academic programming has evolved and is now a K-8 public community school offering a curriculum that is aligned to the Common Core State Standards. We believe that the success of our students will be dependent upon the collaborative efforts of our students, parents, teachers, and administrators, whom all have high expectations for their learning.
